name: CIRNO TRAINING '99
description:
Dodge bullets as long as you can! Collect bombs to clear the screen. Brag about your scores to the vast emptiness of space. Also Touhou.

A jam-game made to honor the freeware game TKKN, or Special Training '99. This game is a fan game, and not affiliated in any way with the actual Touhou games.

Music by Rolemusic

Tracks used

A ninja among culturachippers - Available under Attribution 3.0 Unported
